participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, loves to inspire others through music.
participant_1.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Larry

participant_2.background: spiderman is my favorite. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. l also love comic books. if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water.
